who redeems your life from the pit
    and crowns you with love and compassion,
who satisfies your desires with good things
    so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s. psalm 103

ٱلَّذِي يَفْدِي مِنَ ٱلْحُفْرَةِ حَيَاتَكِ. ٱلَّذِي يُكَلِّلُكِ بِٱلرَّحْمَةِ وَٱلرَّأْفَةِ. 5ٱلَّذِي يُشْبِعُ بِٱلْخَيْرِ عُمْرَكِ، فَيَتَجَدَّدُ مِثْلَ ٱلنَّسْرِ شَبَابُكِ.

column1:
وعظة أبونا داود لمعى : ازاى متخسرش حد فى حياتك : 7 ت
1- توقع الغضب من اللى قدامك و دى حرب متكررة من الشيطان .
2- تقبل النقد بكل أشكاله .
3- تمسك بالصمت العاقل .
4- تنازل فى الكرامة و المادة .
5- تحمل ضعفات من حولك .
6- تناسى الإساءة .
7- تسلح بالصلاة و الإنجيل .
Every Experience is part of his divine plan Merna Michel

You're focusing on the problem. If you focus on the problem, you can't see the solution. Never focus on the problem!

column1:
When I said, “My foot is slipping,”
    your unfailing love, Lord, supported me.
 When anxiety was great within me,
    your consolation brought me joy.psalm 94

“Because he loves me,” says the Lord, “I will rescue him;
    I will protect him, for he acknowledges my name.
 He will call on me, and I will answer him;
    I will be with him in trouble,
    I will deliver him and honor him.
 With long life I will satisfy him
    and show him my salvation.” Psalm 91
You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.Jeremiah 29:13
